title: La Flor Dominicana Celebrates 25 Years w/ Guest Jonathan Carney
itunes:title: La Flor Dominicana Celebrates 25 Years w/ Guest Jonathan Carney
description:
This week we welcome to the show Mr. America, Jonathan Carney the VP of Sales from La Flor Dominicana. The company made it’s debut in 1994, and now in 2019 the company is celebrating their 25th Anniversary. We will catch up with the real Mr. Jonathan and find out all things LFD as we smoke an advance release of the 25th Anniversary Cigar.

In the second hour we will fire up a cigar from the care package in La Galera Habano Chavetta as we talk about a new bill that passed in the state of Maryland that will change the landscape of online cigar sales. It was the subject of a David Garofalo editorial that needs to be heard.

We will have this all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
